title: Members
description: Get information about members in a specific Mailchimp list.

id.title: The unique id for the list.
id.description: The unique id for the list.

unique_email_id.title: email MD5 hash.
unique_email_id.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

email_type.title: email type
email_type.description: Email type preference of the subscriber.

consents_to_one_to_one_messaging.title: consents to one to one messaging

timestamp_signup.title: Action date and time
timestamp_signup.description: The date and time recorded for the action in ISO 8601 format

ip_signup.title: Action ip address
ip_signup.description: The IP address recorded for the action.

timestamp_opt.title: Action date and time
timestamp_opt.description: The date and time recorded for the action in ISO 8601 format

last_changed.title: Action date and time
last_changed.description: The date and time the list member was last changed in ISO 8601 format

ip_opt.title: Action ip address
ip_opt.description: The IP address recorded for the action.

email_client.title: email client
email_client.description: Email client used by the subscriber.
